{{cpp/experimental/pmr/monotonic_buffer_resource/title|release}}
{{cpp/experimental/lib extensions/pmr/monotonic_buffer_resource/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=libfund_ts | 1=
void release();
}}
{{dcl end}}

Releases all allocated memory by calling the {{tt|deallocate}} function on the upstream memory resource as necessary.

Memory is released back to the upstream resource even if {{tt|deallocate}} has not been called for some of the allocated blocks.
